personal.name: Anthony Limiero
personal.summary: Aerospace Engineer with 2+ years of hands-on experience planning, developing, and executing verification and qualification test programs for spaceflight hardware.
personal.details: US citizen | Eligible for security clearance | Seeking full-time employment | Available January 2026

positions.title: Mech Engineering Student Co-op
bullets: Conducted mechanical and electrical verification/debug campaigns for high-reliability avionics on the C-5 cargo plane
Owned the development/build of mechanical test fixturing for verifying test requirements for vibration testing
Generated and maintained test documentation and characterized test data to determine pass/fail criteria
Precision assembly of mechanical test fixtures using tools like torque wrenches, calipers, and micrometers
